notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.Ć.Z.: Conceptualization, methodology, chemical analysis, and writing—reviewing and editing the manuscript. J.Š. and K.K. (Karolína Komzáková): sample preparation and chemical analysis; N.D.D.: visualization and writing—reviewing and editing the manuscript; K.K. (Katarína Kaffková): sample collection and identification; P.T.: conceptualization, reviewing, and editing the manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
